Class AbsenceDate

java.lang.Object
  AbsenceDate

public class AbsenceDate
extends java.lang.Object

Creates an object that holds the date of the absence along with the the reason for the absence.

Author:
Divya

getStrungDate

public java.lang.String getStrungDate()
Returns the American number representation of the date. For example May 3rd, 2014 would be returned as 5/3/2014

Returns:
String of numerical representation of date.
